author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/redhat-8+/subversion.spec : Turn automated tests back on.  Now
rpm/rhel-4/subversion.spec : Make changelog same all across the board.

author: kou
msg: Use $symname in the Ruby bindings if SWIG > 1.3.29 because
"[swig-Bugs-1516954] replace $symname in all typemap" is fixed.

author: dws
msg: packages/rpm/redhat-8+/apr.patch : Delete no longer used APR patch.

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: A follow-up to r20471, again
short-circuiting 'merge' processing as soon as resolution of the
requested merge range shows that it represents a no-op.
(enum merge_type): A new enumeration providing a tri-state return
value for grok_range_info_from_opt_revisions() which it can use to
indicate the "merge operation type": merge, revert, no-op.
parameter to MERGE_TYPE, and fix implementation to use this output
parameter to communicate to the caller whether a merge's ranges
variable, and using it to bail out early when possible.  In
do_single_file_merge(), also remove unused local variable
